magampura waraya kamkaruwange rakiya, jiwana kondesi saha samaja ayithin aaraksha kara gatha hakke samastha kamakaru panthiya samaga ekabaddhawa swadhina deshapalana balayak lesa sanwidhanaya wemin waraya saha sesu mulika karmantha samaja ayithiyata saha kamkaruwange pa්rajathantha්rawadi palanayata yatath karana samajawadi kriyamargayak kriyawata damana kamkaruwange ha gowinge aanduwak balayata gena eemata karana satanak thulin ma pamani.

eya shri lankawe dewana kasat pataya lesada dakwiya haka.eheth eya nihal nelsan mahathage prathama kasat patayayi.”gune ayiyage bajawu kamare”lesa handinwu eya shri lankawa sisara athi janapriya wiya.halpitage menma nihal nelsan mahathage mul nirmanaya wu eya mage mathakaye hatiyata thawath athi daksha sangitha adhyaksakawarayeku wu lal thenabadu mahathage mulma gi thanu nirmanayayi.

samaharu wala paththara balala nikan inne nathuwa eewaye inna charitha widiyata rangapannatada patan ganna tharamata wala paththara lankawe pissuwak uneya .ee widiyata pissu watichcha un wala paththara neweyi res paththarayak gana kathakarath thaman kiyawu wala paththara(thaman innawa kiyala hithan inna eewa) wala wisthara kiyanneya.naththan yamak kiya wala paththarayaka namak pasuwa kiyanneya.un sama detama uda harana ganne thaman issara kiyawu wala paththara walinya.eewagema eewage aayo wala kathandara liyannatada(wala katha karayek) patan gannoya.ee welawata un karanne thamanta pitawana adho wathaya pawa wala kathawata anthar gatha karana ekaya.
